name: Kill Them Bugs
description:
Kill them bugs was made for Github's Game Off 2021 Game Jam. 

Giant bugs have have taken control of a facility and its your job to go in and eliminate the bugs. You will need to fight your way through killing all the bugs and then blow up the facility to make sure that you Kill Them Bugs.

Kill Them Bugs is a first person shooter game in which you need to fight through enemy bugs in order to reach and then defeat their boss and destroy the facility.

Controls:

Move     WASD

Aim     Mouse

Jump     Space

Shoot     Left Mouse Button

Melee     Right Mouse Button

Reload     R

Switch Weapons     Q E

Pause     Escape

Made By 

Jay Wedge

Jamie Carmichael

Source code available on GitHub.
